11#ifndef MODULES_AUDIO_CODING_NETEQ_BUFFER_LEVEL_FILTER_H_
12#define MODULES_AUDIO_CODING_NETEQ_BUFFER_LEVEL_FILTER_H_
13
14#include <stddef.h>
15#include <stdint.h>
16
17#include "rtc_base/constructor_magic.h"
18
19namespace webrtc {
20
21class BufferLevelFilter {
22 public:
23 BufferLevelFilter();
24 virtual ~BufferLevelFilter() {}
25 virtual void Reset();
26
27 // Updates the filter. Current buffer size is |buffer_size_samples|.
28 // |time_stretched_samples| is subtracted from the filtered value (thus
29 // bypassing the filter operation).
30 virtual void Update(size_t buffer_size_samples, int time_stretched_samples);
31
32 // Set the filtered buffer level to a particular value directly. This should
33 // only be used in case of large changes in buffer size, such as buffer
34 // flushes.
35 virtual void SetFilteredBufferLevel(int buffer_size_samples);
36
37 // The target level is used to select the appropriate filter coefficient.
38 virtual void SetTargetBufferLevel(int target_buffer_level_ms);
39
40 // Returns filtered current level in number of samples.
41 virtual int filtered_current_level() const {
42 // Round to nearest whole sample.
43 return (int64_t{filtered_current_level_} + (1 << 7)) >> 8;
44 }
45
46 private:
47 int level_factor_; // Filter factor for the buffer level filter in Q8.
48 int filtered_current_level_; // Filtered current buffer level in Q8.
49
50 RTC_DISALLOW_COPY_AND_ASSIGN(BufferLevelFilter);
51};
52
53} // namespace webrtc
54#endif // MODULES_AUDIO_CODING_NETEQ_BUFFER_LEVEL_FILTER_H_
55
